scripts.start: concurrently "cd ui && npm start" "cd server && npm start"

//scriptsComments.protoc: TODO Compile .proto definitions into JavaScript/TypeScript definitions. This doesn't get run automatically (yet), so it should be run manually whenever protobuf definitions change.

//dependenciesComments.@typescript-eslint/parser: TypeScript parsing support for ESLint (the parser converts the code into a data structure that the linter can understand)
//dependenciesComments.concurrently: Run two commands concurrently in the same terminal
//dependenciesComments.cross-env: Allows setting environment variables for both Unix and Windows
//dependenciesComments.eslint-config-prettier: Turns off ESLint rules that would conflict with Prettier.
//dependenciesComments.eslint-plugin-prettier: ESLint plugin that runs Prettier as an ESLint rule
//dependenciesComments.prettier: Code formatter to make code look pretty
